definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Tourism is an enduring sunrise industry.
sentences.chinese: 旅遊業是永恆的朝陽產業。

sentences.english: Tourism is praised as "Smokeless Industry" or "Everlasting SunriseIndustry".
sentences.chinese: 旅遊業被譽爲“無煙工業”和“永遠的朝陽產業”。

sentences.english: The sunrise industry will attract more investment in the next few years.
sentences.chinese: 未來幾年朝陽產業將吸引更多的投資。

sentences.english: Biology pesticide industry is the rising sun industry and it can nowadays satisfy the persistence development request.
sentences.chinese: 生物農藥產業是當今可持續發展要求下的朝陽產業。

definition: Yunfu prefecture level city in Guangdong province 廣東省|广东省[Guang3 dong1 sheng3] in south China

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3

definition: interregional/spanning two or more PRC provinces
(of friends or partners) to share both the honor and the disgrace (idiom)
